IA.DistFS

Class Servers

  • java.lang.Object
    • IA.DistFS.Servers

  • public class Servers
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulates a distributed file system with replication. Each server stores a number of files Files are replicated in at least n of N servers. Each server can compute the time of transmission to a user
